data.title: A Chinese entrepreneur is offering a huge reward to a senior official if he swims in a polluted river for 20 minutes, an attempt to draw attention to China's the environmental problems.
In Russia, proposed bill will ban pride parades and public LGBT awareness events, as well as what has been deemed as pro-gay attitudes on television
Israel passes law banning models that have a BMI under 18.5
Israeli Police arrest ultra-orthodox Jewish man who ordered woman to back of bus
Halve meat consumption, scientists urge rich world: “People in the rich world should become "demitarians" – eating half as much meat as usual… in order to avoid severe environmental damage”
Russian lawmaker found dead in barrel of cement.

At least 3,000 children, including four under the age of 10 found huddled together in frozen embrace, are now known to have died during attendance at Canada's Indian residential schools, according to new unpublished research.

“Anonymous” Hacks U.S. Federal Reserve Bank – Investigation Still Going On
Western porn showcased on large LED screen in a public square in Zhongshan, China for 20 minutes.
